title: Sheriff Major

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player to Interrogate. At night, you open a chat with them, appearing only as the "Sheriff Major".
- While Interrogating a player, choose one of the below to learn:
 - If the player is suspicious or not
 - Choose a role, and learn if they're that role or not
 - Who that player visited last night
- At night, twice per game you may choose to roleblock your target. This does not count as a night action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot send a player to the gallows if you visited them last night.
- RB immune while roleblocking players
- Interrogated players can still act and do everything as normal. Interrogation is not like jail in this regard.
- __*Part of the Town Power Variety Pack*__
